headline: Why Ralph Lauren (RL) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of fashion brand Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) fell 17.9% in the morning session after President Trump announced "reciprocal tariffs" on all US imports, set at a rate of 10%.

headline: Neiman Marcus and Ralph Lauren Unveil Exclusive 'Patchwork Americana' Collection
summary: Neiman Marcus and Ralph Lauren are proud to introduce Patchwork Americana, an exclusive collection that reimagines the iconic patchwork motif with elevated craftsmanship and contemporary allure. Marking Ralph Lauren's first-ever exclusive collection for the luxury retailer, the 52-piece assortment spanning men's, women's and kids, is designed with the Neiman Marcus customer in mind. headline: Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs make apparel stocks like Nike uninvestable: Wall Street reacts
summary: Apparel companies brace for a year of profit-busting tariffs.
